name: tinypg
description: Easy way to call sql files using postgres.

scripts.test: npm run build-test && NODE_ENV=test ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha 'src/test/**/*.js' --full-trace -t 15000 $MOCHA_FLAGS --require source-map-support/register --reporter spec
scripts.test-debugging: npm run build-test && NODE_ENV=test ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha 'src/test/**/*.js' --debug-brk=5858 --no-timeouts --colors --full-trace $MOCHA_FLAGS --require source-map-support/register --reporter spec

author: Joe Andaverde
